backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with storage and authorization mixins plus all core domain types for schools, staff, payments, packing, and training visits.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to impacted frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries describing behavior and responsibilities of various frontend pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables for light and dark themes along with base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with TanStack Router, React Query client, theming, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Renders an alert explaining missing Demo/Preview Mode data using configurable messaging.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Displays the Demo/Preview Mode banner with role switcher, data‑reset warning, and light/dark‑mode‑safe styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout that loads user profile, shows role‑based navigation, and includes demo mode banner and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Renders role-based navigation links with active-state styling and optional mobile behavior.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: Provides searchable school list with filters and role-specific action links, showing loading skeletons or results table.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: Implements localStorage-backed demo data persistence for schools and other domain records with reset detection.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Defines demo-mode mutation rules and helpers to allow or block specific actions.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic user profiles for each staff role in demo mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps staff roles to their corresponding demo dashboard routes.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Manages demo-mode session state in localStorage including activation, role, and credential validation.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: Hook exposing demo-mode state and functions to set role or exit demo mode with storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, schools, payments, packing, training, and academic data, with demo-mode fallbacks. Defines a local Payment interface and integrates with an actor-based backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full set of CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values. Applies global border, background, and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Displays and filters academic queries, allowing academic staff to respond and update query status. Uses dialogs for responses and maps school IDs to names.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Shows school payment details including outstanding amounts with edit and save capabilities. Uses query hooks to fetch and update payment data with demo-mode considerations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSchoolDeta: Displays consolidated school details for admins, including metadata, outstanding amounts, packing status, visits, and queries. Handles loading, demo mode, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Displays audit logs with search and entity-type filtering, showing results in a table with demo-mode handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Provides school search and selection to view and update a school's outstanding amount with validation and mutation support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Lists staff profiles and supports creating, editing, and repairing staff records with dialogs and demo-mode restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Shows counts of open and resolved academic queries with quick navigation to the full queries list.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Displays total schools and provides an accounts-focused school search panel.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Aggregates system-wide metrics including schools, outstanding amounts, packing statuses, and query counts.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Offers marketing metrics and searchable school list with outstanding amounts and packing details for selected schools.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Renders a packing dashboard showing total schools and quick navigation actions using school list data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Displays training overview with total schools, open/solved queries, and a school search panel.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login via Internet Identity or demo mode, handling authentication flows, errors, and redirects based on user role. Manages form state, clipboard copying, and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Provides a form to create a new school and redirects based on user role after submission.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Defines available packing class and theme options for selection components.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Lists and filters schools for packing management and allows selecting a school to view details.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Manages packing status and counts per school, supporting class/theme selection and backend updates.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Shows detailed school info with editable fields and outstanding amount status, restricted by user role.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Training visits page that displays school visits, supports creating/editing visits with file uploads, and allows submitting academic queries.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Lists all academic queries raised by the user with status, details, and optional responses.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's TanStack Router route tree, including auth checks, demo mode handling, and role‑based dashboard routing.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Utility to extract safe, user‑friendly messages from unknown error objects, including BigInt serialization handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash‑based routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project architecture, features, known issues, and current state for planning and maintenance.
